Text: In mathematics, the Gershgorin circle theorem may be used to bound the spectrum of a square matrix.

Text: Gershgorin circle theorem:  The spelling of S. A. Gershgorin's name has been transliterated in several different ways, including Geršgorin, Gerschgorin, Gershgorin, Hershhorn, and Hirschhorn.
